channel.title: CVE Feed for Hikvision -- LocalServiceComponents
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hikvision -- LocalServiceComponents

item.title: CVE-2023-28812|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- hikvision -- localservicecomponents
item.description: There is a buffer overflow vulnerability in a web browser plug-in could allow an attacker to exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted messages to computers installed with this plug-in, which could lead to arbitrary code execution or cause process exception of the plug-in.
